roleset.name: mess up, fail, make a mistake
roleset.note: ERROR-N NOTES: Roleset based on comparison to screw.01 (screw up); mistake.01 noun sense. Framed by Claire. (from error.01-n)
ERR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'err' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from err.01-v)

example.name: within LVC
example.text: Mr. Guber and Mr. Peters refuse to concede that they may have made a tactical error in accepting the Sony offer before taking it up with Warner .
example.arg: in accepting the Sony offer before taking it up with Warner .

example.name: All args
example.text: City Clerk Nancy Shollenberger announced today that she would reimburse the City for expenses incurred due to her error on the Sample ballot
